job_tasks.phrase: Modellen die voorspellen welke advertentie banner/creative het meest geschikt is voor een online bezoeker
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core task of developing predictive models for advertising suitability, which falls under model development.

job_tasks.phrase: Predictieve modellen voor most likely converters/clickers van advertentie campagnes
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions predictive models for user behavior, a key aspect of traditional ML model development.

job_tasks.phrase: Predictieve modellen voor het voorspellen van leeftijd en gender van DPG Media online bezoekers obv geconsumeerde content
job_tasks.justification: This describes the development of predictive models for user attributes based on content consumption, fitting the definition of model development.

job_tasks.phrase: Toevoegen van profile enrichments in batch & real-time flows in een big data environment
job_tasks.justification: This task involves data processing and management within a big data environment, aligning with data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Data pipelines & dashboards voor quality monitoring & alerting
job_tasks.justification: This refers to building data pipelines and monitoring systems, which is a core data engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: Je bouwt en onderhoudt ook data pipelines & werkt mee aan onze web applicaties.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates involvement in building and maintaining data pipelines and working on web applications, which are software development tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Je analyseert requirements, experimenteert met verschillende modellen, onderbouwt je keuzes adhv quality parameters, implementeert & presenteert resultaten naar het dev & business team
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of analyzing requirements, experimenting with models, implementing, and presenting results, which are integral to software development and integration of ML models.

job_tasks.phrase: You build it, you run it mentaliteit (development & devops, infra-as-code, CICD, ...)
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions a 'build it, run it' mentality, including DevOps, infra-as-code, and CI/CD, which are core MLOps tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Je bouwt mee aan onze onderliggende data stack & data pipelines (python, PySpark, ElasticSearch, Terraform, Airflow,..)
job_tasks.justification: This task involves building data stacks and pipelines using specific tools, falling under data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Je bouwt samen met de Data & ML engineers ons ML Ops platform uit
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to building an ML Ops platform, a key MLOps responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Je integreert onze services met andere DPG teams die van onze data services gebruik maken
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of services with other teams, a typical software development and integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: Indien gewenst, bouw je mee aan onze web-applicaties (voor interne & externe gebruikers) die onze data-producten ontsluiten
job_tasks.justification: This involves building web applications to expose data products, which is a software development task.

soft_skills.phrase: Je versterkt ons scrum team bestaande uit Product Owner, Scrum Master & 8 developers.
soft_skills.justification: While this mentions team structure, the context of working within a scrum team implies collaboration and understanding of business processes.

soft_skills.phrase: Je neemt deel aan standups, refinements, retro's & demo's (2-week)
soft_skills.justification: Participation in scrum ceremonies indicates collaboration and communication within a team.

soft_skills.phrase: je onderbouwt je keuzes adhv quality parameters, implementeert & presenteert resultaten naar het dev & business team
soft_skills.justification: Presenting results to both dev and business teams requires strong communication skills.

soft_skills.phrase: Je integreert onze services met andere DPG teams die van onze data services gebruik maken
soft_skills.justification: Integrating services with other teams necessitates collaboration and communication.

soft_skills.phrase: Je neemt ownership & accountability voor bepaalde modellen, jobs & applicaties
soft_skills.justification: Taking ownership and accountability directly maps to the 'Innovation & Ownership' soft skill.

soft_skills.phrase: Daarnaast coach je Machine Learning engineers
soft_skills.justification: Coaching other engineers implies communication, knowledge sharing, and collaboration.

profile.rationale: The job ad focuses heavily on traditional ML tasks such as building predictive models for user behavior and advertising suitability. While there are elements of software development (web applications, data pipelines, MLOps), the core responsibilities and examples provided are centered around traditional machine learning, not Generative AI. There is no mention of LLMs, RAG, or other GenAI-specific technologies or tasks. The role involves building and maintaining ML models, data pipelines, and MLOps, with a significant portion dedicated to model development and data engineering, fitting the 'Core ML Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is very clear and detailed, explicitly mentioning traditional ML tasks and relevant technologies. The distinction between traditional ML and GenAI is clear, and the role's responsibilities align well with the 'Core ML Engineer' profile without ambiguity.
